io.oasp.gastronomy.restaurant.salesmanagement.logic.api.usecase

Interface UcManageBill

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Salesmanagement
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SalesmanagementImpl, UcManageBillImpl

    public interface UcManageBill
    Interface of UcManageBill to centralize documentation and signatures of methods.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BillEto createBill(BillEto bill)
      Create a BillEto and save it in the database by linking the billed order positions with it.
      void deleteBill(long billId)
      This method deletes a BillEto from the database by its given id.
      PaymentStatus doPayment(BillEto bill)
      This method provides the payment process.
      PaymentStatus doPayment(BillEto bill, PaymentData paymentDataDebitor)
      This method provides the payment process.

    • Method Detail

      • createBill

        BillEto createBill(BillEto bill)
        Create a BillEto and save it in the database by linking the billed order positions with it. A bill also consists of the total amount as well as the tip, the waiter could fill in. The tip is at default 0.0.
        Parameters:
        bill - that gets created in the database.
        Returns:
        the created BillEto

      • deleteBill

        void deleteBill(long billId)
        This method deletes a BillEto from the database by its given id.
        Parameters:
        billId - the ID of the BillEto that has to be deleted.

      • doPayment

        PaymentStatus doPayment(BillEto bill)
        This method provides the payment process. It provides the cash-only functionality without any additional PaymentData.
        Parameters:
        bill - is the identifier of the BillEto on which the payment process takes place.
        Returns:
        the status code of the payment process.

      • doPayment

        PaymentStatus doPayment(BillEto bill,
                        PaymentData paymentDataDebitor)
        This method provides the payment process.
        Parameters:
        paymentDataDebitor - is the PaymentData which holds special data for the payment process.
        bill - is the identifier of the BillEto on which the payment process takes place.
        Returns:
        the status code of the payment process.
